pages.index: Timepiece - Watches Online Store About us Gallery Our team Contacts +91-734-1952471 timepiece@gmail.com Discover Timeless Elegance Explore our exclusive collection of luxury watches crafted for perfection. Our Journey Timepiece was founded in 2016 in India by visionary watchmaker, Rajiv Kapoor. Rajiv's passion for horology began at a young age, inspired by his grandfather's antique pocket watches. Determined to create a brand that combined traditional craftsmanship with modern elegance, Rajiv set out to establish Timepiece as a symbol of excellence in the watchmaking industry. Since its inception, Timepiece has grown from a small workshop in Jaipur to an internationally recognized name in luxury watches. Each piece is meticulously crafted, reflecting our commitment to quality and precision. Our collection features a blend of timeless designs and innovative technology, ensuring that every Timepiece watch is both a work of art and a reliable timekeeper. About Our Company At Timepiece, we believe that a watch is more than just a tool for telling time; it is a reflection of one’s personal style and a symbol of craftsmanship. Our founder, Rajiv Kapoor, was driven by a passion for horology and a vision to blend traditional watchmaking techniques with contemporary aesthetics. From the outset, Rajiv committed to sourcing the finest materials and employing skilled artisans to create watches that are both beautiful and enduring. Each Timepiece watch is a testament to this commitment, featuring intricate detailing and robust construction. Timepiece’s journey from a modest workshop in Jaipur to an internationally acclaimed brand is a story of relentless pursuit of excellence. We take pride in our extensive collection that caters to a diverse clientele, offering everything from classic dress watches to cutting-edge sports models. Our dedication to innovation ensures that each watch not only meets the highest standards of accuracy but also embodies the elegance and sophistication our customers expect. Our Products Explore our exquisite collection of luxury watches, each crafted with precision and elegance. Our Advantages Discover what sets Timepiece apart in the world of luxury watches. Unmatched Quality Each Timepiece watch is crafted with the highest standards of precision and durability. Our commitment to quality ensures that every watch is built to last, combining the finest materials with expert craftsmanship. Timeless Design Our designs are a blend of classic elegance and modern sophistication. Timepiece watches are designed to be versatile, suitable for any occasion, and always in style. Exceptional Service We pride ourselves on providing outstanding customer service. From the moment you browse our collection to the day you wear your Timepiece watch, our team is dedicated to ensuring a seamless and enjoyable experience. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Timepiece About us Gallery Our team Contacts +91-734-1952471 timepiece@gmail.com Privacy Policy Welcome to our Privacy Policy page! At our company, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy document outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected by us and how it is used. Information We Collect We collect information from you when you visit our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or fill out a form. The types of information we may collect include your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and payment information. Additionally, we may collect information about your interactions with our website, such as the pages you visit, the links you click, and other actions you take. How We Use Your Information The information we collect from you may be used in the following ways: To personalize your experience and respond better to your individual needs. To improve our website based on the information and feedback we receive from you. To improve customer service and support your needs more effectively. To process transactions securely and provide the products or services you requested. To administer a contest, promotion, survey, or other site feature. To send periodic emails with updates pertaining to your order or other products and services. How We Protect Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order, enter, submit, or access your personal information. These security measures include password-protected directories and databases, SSL (Secure Sockets Layered) technology to ensure that your information is fully encrypted and sent across the Internet securely, and PCI Scanning to actively protect our servers from hackers and other vulnerabilities. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property, or safety. Third-Party Links Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our website. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites. Online Privacy Policy Only This online privacy policy applies only to information collected through our website and not to information collected offline. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. Policy changes will apply only to information collected after the date of the change. Contacting Us If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us using the information below: Email: timepiece@gmail.com Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our privacy policy. Home Our team Privacy policy Terms of Use Where style meets time

Reach out to us and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. We’re here to help with all your needs, from product inquiries to support. I accept Privacy policy At Timepiece, we are committed to delivering your orders swiftly and safely. Our shipping options include standard and express delivery, ensuring you receive your timepiece at your convenience. We offer worldwide shipping and provide tracking information so you can monitor your package. If you have any issues or special requests, our customer service team is available to assist you. We pride ourselves on exceptional customer service. Feel free to contact us for any queries regarding your orders, product information, or any other assistance you might need. We aim to make your shopping experience seamless and enjoyable. Thank you for choosing Timepiece. We look forward to serving you and making your watch buying experience exceptional. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are always here to help you find the perfect timepiece. Home Our team Privacy policy Terms of Use Where style meets time

If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website. Use of the Website By accessing the website, you warrant and represent to us that you are legally entitled to do so and to make use of information made available via the website. Nothing contained on this website should be construed as granting any license or right to use any trademark without the prior written permission of the website owner. Use or reliance on any external links and the content thereon provided is at your own risk. Warranties The website owner makes no warranties, representations, statements, or guarantees (whether express, implied in law, or residual) regarding the website. Disclaimer of Liability The website owner shall not be responsible for and disclaims all liability for any loss, liability, damage (whether direct, indirect, or consequential), personal injury, or expense of any nature whatsoever which may be suffered by you or any third party (including your company), as a result of or which may be attributable, directly or indirectly, to your access and use of the website, any information contained on the website, your or your company’s personal information or material and information transmitted over our system. In particular, neither the website owner nor any third party or data or content provider shall be liable in any way to you or to any other person, firm, or corporation whatsoever for any loss, liability, damage (whether direct or consequential), personal injury, or expense of any nature whatsoever arising from any delays, inaccuracies, errors in, or omission of any share price information or the transmission thereof, or for any actions taken in reliance thereon or occasioned thereby or by reason of non-performance or interruption, or termination thereof. Conflict of Terms If there is a conflict or contradiction between the provisions of these website terms and conditions and any other relevant terms and conditions, policies, or notices, the other relevant terms and conditions, policies, or notices which relate specifically to a particular section or module of the website shall prevail in respect of your use of the relevant section or module of the website. Severability Any provision of any relevant terms and conditions, policies, and notices, which is or becomes unenforceable in any jurisdiction, whether due to being void, invalidity, illegality, unlawfulness, or for any reason whatever, shall, in such jurisdiction only and only to the extent that it is so unenforceable, be treated as pro non scripto and the remaining provisions of any relevant terms and conditions, policies, and notices shall remain in full force and effect.
